story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0100: Phew... We barely made it out of there.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0200:
I thought we were going to get smashed
like pancakes!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0300:
You really don’t know the meaning of “go easy,”
do you.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0400: Thank you all for coming to my aid!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0500:
Unfortunately, Team Rocket stole a memory
stick that had my research data on it.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0600:
We weren’t able to stop them after all...
But the most important thing is that you’re
safe, Professor.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_0800:
Leave Team Rocket to us. We’ll keep squashing
them, no matter how many times it takes!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1000:
Yeah, I know. Now it’s our turn to take
the initiative.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1100:
We just have to make sure we take down
Giovanni before he figures out the secrets of these
sync stones!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1200:
Let’s hit the road! The sooner we take him out,
the better!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1300:
Although...maybe I shouldn’t work you guys too
hard, huh.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1400: Sounds like you could use some help!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1600:
Why don’t you and Red go on ahead? We’ll join
you later with [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
the others!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1700: Sounds good to me! Thanks, you two!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1800: W-wait! Rockruff and I can still fight!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_1900:
No way. You shouldn’t overwork your Pokémon.
Resting up is all part of strategy, y’know!
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_2000:
Agreed. We need you to be ready when the time
is right.
story_teamrocket_01_14000/2401_1201_2300:
Be sure to rest up before we leave. I’m sure the
next battle won’t be an easy one.
